qas.question: In what is the torch flame kept lit when the torch must be off?
The torch is put out at night, on aircraft, during storms and what else?

context: The Olympic Flame is supposed to remain lit for the whole relay. When the Torch is extinguished at night, on airplanes, in bad weather, or <a1_0>during protests<a1_0/> (such as the several occasions in Paris), the Olympic Flame is kept alight in a set of 8 <a0_0>lanterns.<a0_0/>[citation needed]
